name: Special Agency: The Series Volume I
name_original: Special Agency: The Series Volume I
description:
April 2016. For two years the fate of the world will be in the hands of a group of secret Agents. Always on the edge of an abyss of madness and desperation, they will risk their lives, their families and their reputations, to unravel a global conspiracy that could move the world to a more than likely apocalypse.

Special Agency: The Series is a full-length campaign for the Special Agency role-playing game. It includes ten intertwined episodes in a detailed environment, presented as if it were a television series, and a section of extras, characters and secondary characters that will unfold throughout a living, open world.
